last_episode_to_air.name: Why Serial Killers Kill
last_episode_to_air.overview:
The biggest mystery of all in respect to the serial killer is "why?"

name: America's Serial Killers: Portraits in Evil
original_name: America's Serial Killers: Portraits in Evil
overview: This true crime docuseries strips the covers from a world of profiling, forensic science and painful investigation to expose history's most brutal serial killers.
